Nightlight:

The femme sobbed when she watched hers husband fell in stasis =
and she tried to crawled towards him in attemp to help him, then she saw an=
d heard the Watchers arrive 

"WHo're ya?"she said worried, would be they f=
riends or foes...? Pain was high... she fought to dont' fell in stasis..."N=
obody else is here... Just us"

IF they where foes, she tought, they woulnd=
't find out anything about her daughter; if they were friends, then they co=
uld help them to find Elita...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rich=
ard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 14, 2005 1:=
55 PM
  Subject: Re: Others awakenings/comlinks with leaders


  : : Rodimu=
s Prime : :
  Rodimus tried to crawl from under the ruble that had fallen o=
n his command chair. He needed to find his wife and daughter. While he was =
in stasis internal repairs had taken effect but Roddy had already lost a lo=
t of energon. After freeing himself from the ruble he falls back into stasi=
s do to lack of energy.

  : : NPC - The Watchers : :

  Four Transformers =
from The Watchers group rip off a panel, crawling through to enter the rece=
ntly crashed Maximal vessel.

  Watcher 1: Get that main blast door open. S=
omeone had to be on the bridge.

  The other three manage to short the syst=
em so the door opens. The four search for a moment before finding Nightligh=
t and Rodimus.

  Watcher 1: Get them out of here and back to base. I'll lo=
ok for any others.

  Watchers 2 and 3 lift Rodimus up and take him for aid=
. Watcher 4 attempts to aid Nightlight. Watcher 1 moves about the ship, sea=
rching for any other life signs.
